metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34684 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer (nvidia.ko), where an off-by-one error may lead to datatampering or information disclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
